ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: Slyde whats even sadder here is that the giants in rathe are capped at 37, hence no mana used... Meanwhile my druid and wizard buddies took their turns and did
ygData.messageBody:
Slyde whats even sadder here is that the giants in rathe are capped at 37,
hence no mana used... Meanwhile my druid and wizard buddies took their turns
and did a few levels in timorous deep doing quad raptors solo.

Minkin
Still in rathe mountains
20 rubies later...
Lev 40 bard
Sol Ro


-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: October 11, 2000 12:02 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of


One thing I find ridiculous - I believe that a lot of our "nerfs" came about
because of other players complaining about bards being too powerful. The
mana component of the higher-level charm song for example - came when (IIRC)
a Druid started ranting about bards taking all the Giants in Rathe Mountain.

I've noticed now more and more Druids doing the "Quad Kiting" tactic - of
kiting 4 mobs at once. Whets unbalanced for a bard is perfectly acceptable
for a Druid...

Ranting once again

Slyde



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
